canPickMany.description: Add checkboxes to enable selection of multiple values.

showName.description: Show the names of the parameter in front of the selected value in the status bar.

showSelection.description: Show the selected value of the parameter in the status bar.

initialSelection.description: Set an initial selected value for the parameter. It must be one (or more in case of canPickMany=true) of the values to pick from. It can be a string or an array of strings.
